metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37451 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Exim before 4.96 has an invalid free in pam_converse in auths/call_pam.c because store_free is not used after store_malloc.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is caused by store_internal_malloc being modified to store extra bytes in the following commit: https://github.com/Exim/exim/commit/1e30b0199daf7a7a882458251a3dc10d45d4c7d1

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
